page.title: 14THE BATTLE OF HASTINGS
page.content: THE BATTLE OF HASTINGS TOOK PLACE ON {SATURDAY 14TH OCTOBER 1066.}WILLIAM DUKE OF NORMANDY HAD INVADED ENGLAND ON 28TH SEPTEMBER 1066 TO CLAIM THE THRONE OF ENGLAND WHICH HE HAD BEEN PROMISED BY KING EDWARD THE CONFESSOR. WHEN EDWARD DIED IN JANUARY 1066 HAROLD EARL OF WESSEX HAD BECOME KING. HE SWORE THAT EDWARD HAD CHANGED HIS MIND AS HE LAY DYING AND HAD CHOSEN HAROLD TO BE THE NEW KING.WILLIAM DISAGREED WITH THIS;HAROLD WAS NO RELATION TO EDWARD BUT WILLIAM WAS A COUSIN AND HE MAINTAINED THAT HAROLD HAD SWORN AN OATH TO HIM IN 1064 TO HELP WILLIAM BECOME KING. THE YEAR 1066 WAS AN EVENTFUL ONE. AS SOON AS NEWS OF HAROLD'S CORONATION REACHED NORMANDY,WILLIAM BEGAN TO PREPARE FOR WAR.IN ENGLAND{HALLEY'S {COMET}WAS SEEN IN APRIL AND IT WAS THOUGHT TO BE A BAD OMEN.HAROLD
